title: who watches ONE PUNCH MAN!
body:
who ever loves anime should love this new series! One punch is by far the best anime out atm! thoughts on latest episode with lord Boros?

if you dont like anime just go dig a hole and jump into it!

replies.body: i was not able to get into it for some reason. But steins gate is the best anime by far for me :D
yea thats a good one, i can give you a few good websites to watch or download if you want man
I meant i did not enjoy the anime, i like the idea but i just dont like how it was done i guess.

> I meant i did not enjoy the anime, i like the idea but i just dont like how it was done i guess.

i dont mind it, the manga better tho
